course_description: In this class, students use MySQL's command line interface to learn about the Structured Query Language (SQL). After installing MySQL on their own computer, students will be instructed on how to create & delete databases; create & delete tables; add data to simple tables; and query tables using SQL. Students will also learn about different datatypes in SQL, and brief overviews of additional operations in SQL (e.g., table joins) will be provided.
prerequisites: This section is reserved for students in the BBA program.
